title: Young Black Jack
synopsis: In the 1960s, a gifted young medical student tries to make a name for himself. Kuroo Hazama is a reserved young man with unusual black-and-white hair, a body covered with scars, and a dark past. Despite only being a medical student, his surgical brilliance starts to attract attention after he completes a seemingly impossible operation. Together with the spirited and honest intern Maiko Okamoto and Yabu, a close friend with a troubled life, Hazama devotes himself to the world of medicine.
voices: ['Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Itou, Shizuka', 'Yusa, Kouji', 'Suwabe, Junichi', 'Tomita, Kousei', 'Miyano, Mamoru', 'Oosaka, Ryouta', 'Takeuchi, Shunsuke', 'Yamanoi, Jin', 'Shioya, Yoku']
staff: [['Kase, Mitsuko', ['Director']], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Takahashi, Ryousuke', ['Script', ' Series Composition']], ['Takuto', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Theme Song Performance', ' Theme Song Composition']]]
